Title: Relates to the use in evidence of the fact of possession or presence on the premises of condoms and other sexual and reproductive health devices
Summary: Relates to the use in evidence of the fact of possession or presence on the premises of condoms and other sexual and reproductive health devices.
LawCode: Add §4519-b, CPLR; amd §60.47, CP L; amd §§841 & 837, Exec L; add §§49 & 83-o, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, the criminal procedure law, the executive law, and the legislative law, in relation to the use in evidence of the fact of possession or presence on the premises of condoms and other sexual and reproductive health devices
